SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.repository

Interface TransactionsRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
TransactionsRepositoryImpl
public interface TransactionsRepository
TransactionReository is an interface for performing operations related to transactions in the database, including finding, adding, updating, and managing transactions.

  • Method Details

    • findByTID

      TransactionsDTO findByTID(String tid) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Finds a transaction by its unique transaction ID (tid).
      Parameters:
      tid - the unique transaction ID
      Returns:
      a TransactionsDTO containing transaction details
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • findCartTransaction

      Transactions findCartTransaction(String uid, String uen) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Finds a cart transaction based on the user's UID and the wholesaler's UEN.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      uen - the wholesaler's unique entity number
      Returns:
      a Transactions object representing the cart transaction
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • getDocByUENAndStatus

      List<com.google.cloud.firestore.QueryDocumentSnapshot> getDocByUENAndStatus(String uen, String status) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves a list of document snapshots filtered by the wholesaler's UEN and the transaction status.
      Parameters:
      uen - the wholesaler's unique entity number
      status - the status of the transaction (e.g. "COMPLETED")
      Returns:
      a list of QueryDocumentSnapshot objects
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • getProductListfromTransaction

      ArrayList<Object> getProductListfromTransaction(com.google.cloud.firestore.DocumentSnapshot document, boolean cart) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Extracts the product list from a transaction document.
      Parameters:
      document - the Firestore document snapshot of the transaction
      cart - a boolean indicating whether the transaction is a cart transaction
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the product list from the transaction
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • addTransaction

      String addTransaction(TransactionsDTO transactionsDTO)
      Adds a new transaction to the database.
      Parameters:
      transactionsDTO - a TransactionsDTO containing transaction details
      Returns:
      the ID of the added transaction as a String

    • updateTransactionProduct

      void updateTransactionProduct(Transactions transaction, String uid, Map<String,Object> data)
      Updates a specific product within a transaction based on user ID and provided data.
      Parameters:
      transaction - the Transactions object representing the transaction to update
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      data - a Map containing the update data for the transaction's product

    • updateProductQuantity

      void updateProductQuantity(String uid, String uen, String swp_id, int quantity, double price) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates the quantity and price of a specific product in a transaction.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      uen - the wholesaler's unique entity number
      swp_id - the wholesaler product's unique identifier within the transaction
      quantity - the new quantity for the product
      price - the updated price for the product
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • updateProductList

      Map<String,Object> updateProductList(String uid, String uen, String swp_id) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Updates the product list in a transaction.
      Parameters:
      uid - the user's unique identifier
      uen - the wholesaler's unique entity number
      swp_id - the wholesaler product's unique identifier within the transaction
      Returns:
      a Map representing the updated product list data
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • getHistoryDetails

      TransactionsOrderedDTO getHistoryDetails(String orderId) throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException
      Retrieves historical transaction details based on the order ID.
      Parameters:
      orderId - the unique identifier of the order
      Returns:
      a TransactionsOrderedDTO containing details of the ordered transaction
      Throws:
      ExecutionException
      InterruptedException

    • updateTransactionRated

      void updateTransactionRated(String tid)
      Marks a transaction as rated based on its transaction ID (TID).
      Parameters:
      tid - the unique transaction ID

    • updateTransactionStatus

      void updateTransactionStatus(Map<String,Object> data)
      Updates the status of a transaction based on provided data.
      Parameters:
      data - a Map containing the transaction's new status information

    • updateTransactionPrice

      void updateTransactionPrice(String tid, double updatedPrice)
      Updates the price of a transaction based on its transaction ID (TID).
      Parameters:
      tid - the unique transaction ID
      updatedPrice - the new price for the transaction
